title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3272/92 of 10 November 1992 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products falling within CN code ex 2904 20 90, originating in China, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3831/90 apply
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3272/92
of 10 November 1992
re-restablishing the levying  of customs duties on products falling within CN code ex  2904  20  90, originating in China, to  which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3831/90 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: As from 15 November 1992, the levying of  customs duties, suspended pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3831/90, shall be reintroduced on  imports into the Community of the following products, originating in China: >TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be  binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 November 1992. For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the  Commission
